Get news updates every time you open a new tab with Daily News Flash!

Your solution for staying updated with headlines from news sites.

Features:
Quick Links to Top News Sites: Access news platforms like CNN, Fox, ESPN, and Variety with one click. Stay informed about breaking news, sports, entertainment, and more.

Search Results by Yahoo: Enjoy updated search engine results by Yahoo!

Minimalist Wallpaper: Enhance your browsing experience with a clean and clutter-free wallpaper design.
Current Time: Keep track of time while browsing with our extension, displaying the current time.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Daily News Flash extension and setting Chrome New Tab searches to Yahoo by the service and the Terms of Service (https://dailynewsflash.co/terms-of-service.html) and Privacy Policy (https://dailynewsflash.co/privacy-policy.html)
